introduction:
Shh! Hi, {firstName}! âœ‹
I'm KIQ, or Keep it Quiet. ğŸ’œ
I'm trying to send a message to your recipient as quietly as possible! ğŸ¤«

To use me, go into any chat, type @keepitquiet_bot (usertag) (message) and click the pop-up button! ğŸ˜Š
Interesting fact: If you put an exclamation mark at the beginning of a user tag, the recipient can read the message only once. â˜

tip.title: If the user tag is entered with the ! (exclamation mark) in beginning, the recipient can read the message only once! ğŸ¤”
tip.message_text: Can you imagine what I find out? It turns out, if the user tag is entered with the ! (exclamation mark) in beginning, the recipient can read the message only once! ğŸ˜²
